verbs.description: jose altuve undergoes knee surgery houston [V: astros] [ARG1: second baseman] jose altuve has reportedly wasted no time trying to rectify the right knee problem that bothered him for the bulk of the season according to mlb com brian mctaggart altuve underwent right knee surgery on friday a day after his astros were eliminated from the american league championship series breaking news houston astros jose altuve brian mctaggart astros josé altuve american league
